author: cnbc.com
title: Target Corporation to Webcast Presentation to Investors on March 6
text:
MINNEAPOLIS, Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) plans to release its fourth quarter and full-year 2017 financial results the morning of March 6. Later that morning the company will webcast its meeting with the financial community from approximately 10:30 a.m. to 12:00 p.m., Central time.
At the meeting, members of the company's leadership team will discuss its strategic and financial plans and provide guidance for the company's expected fiscal 2018 financial performance.
Investors and others are invited to access the presentations and Q&A session online on the Events & Presentations section of Target.com/Investors . The webcast will be archived for at least 90 days following the meeting.
About Target
Minneapolis-based Target Corporation (NYSE: TGT) serves guests at 1,822 stores and at Target.com . Since 1946, Target has given 5 percent of its profit to communities, which today equals millions of dollars a week. For more information, visit Target.com/Pressroom . For a behind-the-scenes look at Target, visit Target.com/abullseyeview or follow @TargetNews on Twitter.
